statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, sender_name, receiver_name FROM communication_logs;
SELECT message, encryption_key FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, message FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, message FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_name='Alice';
SELECT log_id, sender_name, receiver_name, encryption_key FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver_name='Bob';
SELECT sender_name, message FROM communication_logs WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver_name='Charlie' AND sender_name='Dave' AND message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages;
SELECT message_text, encryption_key FROM encrypted_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM encrypted_messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM message_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM message_logs WHERE sender_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM encrypted_messages WHERE encryption_key = 'ABC123';
SELECT * FROM message_logs WHERE sender_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, encryption_key FROM encrypted_messages WHERE message_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM message_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM encrypted_messages WHERE receiver_id = 200;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 100 AND receiver_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM encrypted_messages WHERE receiver_id = 150 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM encrypted_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM encrypted_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;

SELECT e.message_text, s.username AS sender_username, r.username AS receiver_username FROM encrypted_messages e JOIN sender_accounts s ON e.sender_id = s.sender_id JOIN receiver_accounts r ON e.receiver_id = r.receiver_id;
SELECT sender_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_message_time FROM encrypted_messages GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT conversation_id, participant1_id, participant2_id FROM conversations WHERE participant1_id < participant2_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT c.* FROM conversations c WHERE c.participant1_id = 1 AND c.participant2_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, u.email, e.encryption_key FROM users u JOIN encryption_keys e ON u.user_id = e.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 4;
SELECT cl.* FROM communication_logs cl JOIN users u ON cl.sender_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, sender FROM encrypted_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND sender = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, sender, receiver FROM encrypted_logs WHERE receiver = 'Bob' LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT users.username, encryption_keys.encryption_key FROM users INNER JOIN encryption_keys ON users.user_id = encryption_keys.user_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM roles LEFT JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name ORDER BY user_count DESC;
